long_description: The MTI Java PFD offers style, comfort and safety at a great value. Durable 400-denier nylon and 300-denier polyester shell offers durable good looks season after season. Contoured foam is shaped to to create a very comfortable fit around the torso. Open sides add ventilation and free arm movement. Shoulder adjustments are covered to add protection and provide a smooth, finished look to the vest. 2 large zippered pockets stash on-the-water essentials and include a tethered safety whistle. Reflective tape increases visibility of the MTI Java PFD in low light.
short_description: The MTI Java PFD offers style, comfort and safety at a great value.
